resources.string: 17km Stone, NH-2, Mathura-Delhi Road Mathura, Chaumuhan, Uttar Pradesh 281406

GLA University is a private university in Mathura,Uttar Pradesh. It has been declared fit to receive central assistance under Section 12B of UGC Act, 1956 after proper assessment for the same by the UGC.It is recognized by University Grants Commission.NCTE and Pharmacy Council of India.It was the year 1991 Shri Narayan Das Agrawal decided to fulfil the dream of his father, Late Shri Ganeshi Lal Agrawal, of establishing an institute for quality education to the people and the region & beyond.Campus of GLA University, Mathura is spread across 110 acres of land offering well designed buildings.
